Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Establishes an LGBT youth and young adult suicide prevention task force; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes an LGBT youth and young adult suicide prevention task force; provides for the number of members, manner of appointment and the topics to be reviewed.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish an LGBT youth and young adult suicide prevention task force; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
